hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
set -e export PATH=$PATH:/opt/cov-analysis/bin/ echo "Cleanup previous report" rm -rf reports/
python client.py checkout
rm -rf mozilla/extensions/purple hg clone http://hg.mozilla.org/users/florian_queze.net/purple mozilla/extensions/purple
# Temporary workaround. Breaks the build otherwise sed -i "/EXTRA_DSO_LDOPTS/d" mozilla/extensions/purple/purplexpcom/src/Makefile.in
echo "Cleanup" ./mozilla/mach clobber
cat > .mozconfig <<EOF ac_add_options --enable-debug --verbose ac_add_options --enable-application=im ac_add_options --enable-extensions=purple
mk_add_options MOZ_MAKE_FLAGS="-j20" EOF
echo "Apply patches on top of the hg repo" hg qpop -a hg qpush -a
echo "Rebuild all" ./mozilla/mach --log-no-times build -v||true # Rebuild a second time to fix the issues ./mozilla/mach --log-no-times build -v
echo "Only rebuild instantbird and not fx" cd obj-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu make export make cov-configure --gcc
cat > rebuild.sh <<EOF #!/bin/bash set -e export COMPS=CXX=/usr/bin/g++ CC=/usr/bin/gcc cd extensions/purple && make -j1 clean \$COMPS && cd - cd extensions/purple/libpurple/ && make -j1 clean all \$COMPS && cd - cd extensions/purple && make -j1 all \$COMPS && cd - cd chat/&& make clean all \$COMPS && cd - cd mozilla/extensions/purple && make clean && cd - cd im/ && make clean all \$COMPS && cd - EOF
chmod +x rebuild.sh
cov-build --dir cov-int $(pwd)/rebuild.sh tar zcvf cov-build.tar.gz cov-int/
minimumsize=20000 actualsize=$(du -k cov-build.tar.gz | cut -f 1) if [ $actualsize -ge $minimumsize ]; then sh /opt/upload-to-coverity-instantbird.sh else echo "Unexpected filesize. Should be at least $minimumsize (found $actualize)" exit 1 fi
cd .. rm -rf obj-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu cov-build.tar.gz cov-int/ exit 0
